document.full_text: french green groups renewed a call on saturday for france to end its dependence on nuclear power, saying a radiation leak at a japanese atomic power plant showed there were no safety guarantees in the industry.
document.title: french greens call for end to nuclear energy
lines_and_colors: french green groups renewed a call on saturday for france to end its dependence on nuclear power, saying a radiation leak at a japanese atomic power plant showed there were no safety guarantees in the industry.
